alert.note: Alert for Northern Phillips; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 9:40AM MDT until March 14 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Northern Phillips and Northern Valley Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 PM MDT this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and create significant drifting. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Impacts to newborn livestock can be expected.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
